text:
Company: Campbell, Howe and Sutton
Role: Tailor

We are seeking an exceptional Tailor to join our team! As a Tailor at Campbell, Howe and Sutton, you will be responsible for creating bespoke garments that exceed our customers' expectations. If you have a passion for tailoring, a keen eye for detail, and excellent communication skills, we want to hear from you.

Responsibilities:

 Create custom garments from scratch, including pattern-making, cutting, and sewing
 Work closely with customers to understand their needs and preferences
 Develop and maintain a strong understanding of fabrics, textures, and colors
 Collaborate with other team members to deliver high-quality garments on time

Qualifications and Experience:

 2+ years of tailoring experience
 Strong understanding of garment construction and textile science
 Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
 Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment

Perks and Benefits:

 We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $55,000 to $70,000 USD, based on your experience and skills.
 Ongoing training and development opportunities
 A dynamic and supportive work environment
 Discounts on our bespoke garments
